name: Childhood memories and friendships
description:
Children are the closest way to love and they are closer to the sky than all the stars and birds.
If the day came when the dream world did not see any child, honesty would surely come to an end and friendship and kindness would be lost behind the great sorrows of our adulthood.
The world is always beautiful with children; The most beautiful of all the days we know.
The childish world is the most intimate world we sometimes wish we could step into once again.
I wish the world would always be a child and make its love songs lullaby our sleepless nights.
I wish children would embrace their intimacy like their innocent friends.
I wish the whole world became childish and we became children; And I wish the world was as beautiful as the days of childhood.
This work of mine is inspired by my friendship and sweet childhood memories.
